node.title: Reshaping the Internet: What’s a Magnet Link?
node.excerpt: Currently in Beta, Project Maelstrom aims to help more of the Internet work the way BitTorrent works. In today’s post, team lead Rob Velasquez discusses one of the key components that makes BitTorrent work so efficiently.
